phrases.phrase: Can edit events added by other users?
Can delete events created by other users?
<title>Event Profile Time Stamp</title><info>Time stamp used when displaying events on a users profile.</info>
<title>Event Browsing Time Stamp</title><info>Time stamp displayed when browsing events.</info>
Max file size for event photos in kilobits (kb). (1000 kb = 1 mb) For unlimited add "0" without quotes.
Events must be approved first before they are displayed publicly?
Define how long this user group must wait until they are allowed to send out another mass email.
Can mass email own event guests?
You are unable to send out any mass emails at the moment.
Fill in both a subject and text for your mass email.
You are unable to send a mass email for this event.
Provide a country location for this event.
Note that events must first be approved by a site admin before it is displayed publicly.
{user_name} left you a comment on your event "{title}". To view this comment, follow the link below: {link}
{user_name} gửi bình luận mới tại event.
{user_name} gửi bình luận mới tại event.
{user_name} gửi bình luận mới tại {item_user_name}'s event.
{full_name} invited you to an event.
Private (Does not show up anywhere and only invited users can RSVP)
Click here to delete this image and upload a new one in its place.
Send out an email to all the guests that are joining this event.
No events found where you might attend.
No events found where you are not attending.
{full_name} has closed their favorites section.
{user_name} added a comment on the event "{title}".
Your event is ending before it starts.
Your event is starting in the past.
{full_name} invited you to "{title}". To check out this event, follow the link below: {link}
Provide a category this event will belong to.
Unable to find the event you want to approve.
You do not have sufficient permission to modify this event.
Unable to find the event you want to delete.
You do not have sufficient permission to delete this listing.
Your event has been approved on {site_title}.
Your event has been approved on {site_title}. To view this event, follow the link below: {link}
Notice: This is a newsletter sent from the event
Can browse and view the event module?
Can members of this user group sponsor their events?
Can members of this user group purchase a sponsored ad space?
To purchase sponsor space for your events click on your event and then click on Sponsor in the right hand side menu.
How much is the sponsor space worth for events? This works in a CPM basis.

After the user has purchased a sponsored space, should the event be published right away? If set to false, the admin will have to approve each new purchased sponsored event space before it is shown in the site.
That event is no longer available.
This event is set to private, sponsoring it conflicts with this setting.
<title>Event Basic Information Time Stamp</title><info>This is the time stamp that is used when viewing an event. It can be found in the "Basic Information" block.</info>
<title>Event Basic Information Time Stamp (Short)</title><info>This is the short version of the time stamp that is used when viewing an event. It can be found in the "Basic Information" block.</info>

How many minutes should a user wait before they can create another event?
Note: Setting it to "0" (without quotes) is default and users will not have to wait.
You are creating an event a little too soon.
How much is the sponsor space worth for events? This works in a CPM basis.
Can members of this user group view a Google Map in the Events section?
Can members of this user group add a Google Map to their events?
How many points does the user get when they add a new event?
Unable to find the event you are trying to comment on.
Control who can see this event.
Control who can share on this event.
Unable to view this item due to privacy settings.
{full_name} liked a comment you posted on the event "{title}"
{full_name} liked your comment "{content}" that you posted on the event "{title}". To view this event follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} liked your event "{title}" To view this event follow the link below: {link}
Unable to post a comment on this item due to privacy settings.
{full_name} commented on a comment posted on the event "{title}".
{full_name} commented on one of your comments you posted on the event "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on one of {gender} event comments.
{full_name} commented on one of {row_full_name}'s event comments.
{full_name} commented on one of {gender} own comments on the event "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on one of {row_full_name}'s comments on the event "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{users} commented on {row_full_name}'s comment on the event "{title}"
{users} commented on {gender} own comment on the event "{title}"
{users} commented on one of your comments on the event "{title}"
{users} commented on one of {row_full_name}'s comments on the event "{title}"
{users} liked {gender} own comment on the event "{title}"
{users} liked one on {row_full_name}'s comments on the event "{title}"
{users} mời bạn tham gia sự kiện "{title}"
{full_name} wrote a comment on your event "{title}".
{full_name} wrote a comment on your event "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
Successfully added a photo to your event.
<title>Profile Event Count</title><info>Avoids querying for count in event.callback getTotalItemCount (called when going to a profile).</info>
<title>Cache Upcoming Events (Hours)</title><info>Cache the upcoming event in hours.</info>
